LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_RifleCQB.label: Miho Submachinegun
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_RifleCQB.description: A multi-purpose submachine gun. It's not ergonomic, and it boasts some screwy performance. Miho's opinion is that there is no such weapon in close combat.\n\nCaliber: 9x19mm Para
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_RifleCQB.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_RifleCQB.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_RifleCQB_Proj.label: smg bullet
LanguageData.Build_Miho_Weapon_RifleCQB.description: A multi-purpose submachine gun. It's not ergonomic, and it boasts some screwy performance. Miho's opinion is that there is no such weapon in close combat.\n\nCaliber: 9x19mm Para
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_Pistol.label: Miho Nail Gun
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_Pistol.description: A nail gun modified for the purpose of killing. It has much more recoil and power than your average nail gun. You can also use it as an ordinary tool, as it was intended.\n\nCaliber: Nail
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_Pistol.tools.0.label: nail
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_Pistol.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_Pistol_Proj.label: nail
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_Pistol.description: A nail gun modified for the purpose of killing. It has much more recoil and power than your average nail gun. You can also use it as an ordinary tool, as it was intended.\n\nCaliber: Nail
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_RifleDefence.label: Miho Infantry Rifle
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_RifleDefence.description: Automatic rifle for infantry. It has the advantage that it can be easily produced even in small, underdeveloped factories.\n\nCaliber: 5.56x45mm
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_RifleDefence.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_RifleDefence.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_RifleDefence_Proj.label: assault rifle bullet
LanguageData.Build_Miho_Weapon_RifleDefence.descripti: Automatic rifle for infantry. It has the advantage that it can be easily produced even in small, underdeveloped factories.\n\nCaliber: 5.56x45mm
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_RifleDefenceGrenade.label: Miho Infantry Rifle (Grenade Launcher)
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_RifleDefenceGrenade.descript:
Automatic rifle for infantry. It has the advantage that it can be easily produced even in small, underdeveloped factories. It also has an underbarrel grenade launcher.

Caliber: 5.56x45mm 

Underbarrel Caliber: 30x29mm grenade
LanguageData.Build_Miho_Weapon_RifleDefenceGrenade.de:
Automatic rifle for infantry. It has the advantage that it can be easily produced even in small, underdeveloped factories. It also has an underbarrel grenade launcher.

Caliber: 5.56x45mm 

Underbarrel Caliber: 30x29mm grenade
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_RifleMachinegun.label: Miho LMG
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_RifleMachinegun.description: A light machine gun. Good for medium range.\n\nCaliber: 5.56x45mm
LanguageData.Build_Miho_Weapon_RifleMachinegun.descri: A light machine gun. Good for medium range.\n\nCaliber: 5.56x45mm
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_RifleOld.label: Miho Old Fashioned Rifle
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_RifleOld.description: An infantry rifle that uses .303 caliber. Although outdated, it still has decent ammunition and is primarily used as a marksman rifle.\n\nCaliber: .303
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_RiflePrecision_Proj.label: rifle bullet
LanguageData.Build_Miho_Weapon_RifleOld.description: An infantry rifle that uses .303 caliber. Although outdated, it still has decent ammunition and is primarily used as a marksman rifle.\n\nCaliber: .303
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_RifleGrenade.label: Miho Infantry Rocket Launcher
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_RifleGrenade.description: A heavy rocket weapon.\n\nCaliber: rpg-7 grenade
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_RifleGrenade_Proj.label: grenade
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_RifleGrenade.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_RifleGrenade.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.Build_Miho_Weapon_RifleGrenade.descripti: A heavy rocket weapon.\n\nCaliber: rpg-7 grenade
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_Shotgun.label: Miho Hunting Rifle
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_Shotgun.description: A precision shotgun suitable for hunting. As always, it is illegal to hunt certain types of (well-dressed, relatively civilized) homo sapiens without a permission.\n\nCaliber: .12 gauge
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_Shotgun_Proj.label: pellet
LanguageData.Build_Miho_Weapon_Shotgun.description: A precision shotgun suitable for hunting. As always, it is illegal to hunt certain types of (well-dressed, relatively civilized) homo sapiens without a permission.\n\nCaliber: .12 gauge
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_AutoShotgun.label: Miho Heavy Shotgun
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_AutoShotgun.description: A classic but intimidating automatic shotgun.\n\nCaliber: .12 gauge
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_Shotgun_Proj.label: pellet
LanguageData.Build_Miho_Weapon_RifleGrenade.descripti: A classic but intimidating automatic shotgun.\n\nCaliber: .12 gauge
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_RiflePlasma.label: Miho Plasma Rifle
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_RiflePlasma.description: A rifle capable of instantaneously creating plasma with temperatures comparable to the sun.\n\nCaliber: plasma cell
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_RiflePlasma.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_RiflePlasma.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_RiflePlasma_Proj.label: plasma bullet
LanguageData.Build_Miho_Weapon_RiflePlasma.descriptio: A rifle capable of instantaneously creating plasma with temperatures comparable to the sun.\n\nCaliber: plasma cell
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_SniperPlasma.label: Miho Medium Plasma Rifle
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_SniperPlasma.description: A medium rifle capable of shooting plasma slugs as hot as the sun. Although usually mounted on Bulgasal tanks this weapon is sometimes used by heavy elite infantry for tactial diversity.\n\nCaliber: plasma cell
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_SniperPlasma_Proj.label: plasma
LanguageData.Build_Miho_Weapon_SniperPlasma.descripti: A medium rifle capable of shooting plasma slugs as hot as the sun. Although usually mounted on Bulgasal tanks this weapon is sometimes used by heavy elite infantry for tactial diversity.\n\nCaliber: plasma cell
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_ShotgunPsychic.label: Miho Mechanite Accelerator Rifle
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_ShotgunPsychic.description: A rifle that uses the caster's psychic ability to accelerate and fire mechanite bullets.\n\nCaliber: mechanite psyshot
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_ShotgunPsychic_Proj.label: pellet
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_RiflePsychic.label: Miho Hadron Collider Rifle
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_RiflePsychic.description: A tiny particle accelerator. Powered by the wielder's psychic abilities. It literally tears enemies apart from the inside.\n\nCaliber: mechanite psyshot
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_RiflePsychic_Proj.label: accelerated pellet
